text: Va cun on [azoʙ]-ro, ki ʙa surati aʙre dar cihati [dastu] darraho [-i hosilxez]- ason pes meomad, musohida kardand, [ʙo sodmoni] guftand: «In aʙrest, ki [rahmate] ʙar mo meʙorad». [Hud guft: na] Balki hamon [azoʙe] ast, ki ʙaroi rasidanas sitoʙ dosted; tundʙodest, ki azoʙe dardnok ʙo xud dorad
